name: Elemental Devourer
description:
After taking Geo DMG, stack 1 level of Elemental Devourer. (Max 2 levels)
When 2 levels of Elemental Devourer have been gained, character deals +1 Geo DMG and takes +2 Geo DMG.
descriptionraw: After taking $[K106], stack 1 level of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color>. (Max 2 levels)\nWhen 2 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color> have been gained, character deals +1 $[K106] and takes +2 $[K106].
descriptionreplaced: After taking {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, stack 1 level of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color>. (Max 2 levels)\nWhen 2 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color> have been gained, character deals +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> and takes +2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
